description: Wanting to welcome/accept but pretending to refuse.

examples.chinese: 如何识破女生的欲迎还拒
examples.translation: How to spot a girl playing hard to get

examples.chinese: 拴住男人心,有一个技巧:欲迎还拒约会
examples.translation: Tip to capture a man's heart: play hard to get dates

examples.chinese: 当别人送你礼物时不要欲迎还拒
examples.translation: Don't play hard to get when someone gives you a gift
